title: Wetlands
description: The formation, characteristics, and functions of wetlands. Genesis of hydric soils. Plant adaptations to saturated soils. Wetlands as wildlife habitat. Policies and social issues associated with wetlands. The procedures of wetland delineations. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as BIO/NR/SSÂ 421.
prerequisites: BOT 121 or BIO 162, CHEM 111 or CHEM 127, and SS 121 or SS 131
